F, No. 2 (l /2010-Pub.-The following Ordinance promulgated by the
President on the I Eth April, 2010 is hereby published for general information:-
OrorNeNce No. XI or 2010
AN
ORDINANCE
further to amend the Women in Distress and Detention Fund Act, 1996
WHEREAS it is expedient further to amend the Women in Distress and
Detention FundAct, 1996 (XV of 1996), for the purposes hereinafter appearing:
AND WHEREAs the NationalAssembly is not in session and the President is
satisfied that circumstances exist which render it necessary to take immediate action:
(24s)
Price : Rs. 2.00
[2358(201O)/Ex. Gaz.]Acts, Ordlnsnces, President's Orders snd Regulatlons
246 THE GAZEITE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., APRIL 20, 2010 [PenI
Now. THEREFoRE, in cxercise of the powers conferred by clause (l) of
Article 89 ofthe Constitution ofthe Islamic Republic of Pakistan, the President is
pleased to make and promulgate the following Ordinance:-
1. Short tltle and commencement.-{l ) This Ordinance may be called
the Womcn in Distress and Detention Fund (Amendment) Ordinance, 2010.
(2) lt shall come into force at once.
2. Amendment of sectlon 6, Act XV of 1996,-In the Women in
Distress and Detention FundAct, 1996 (XV of 1996), in section 6,-
(a) in sub-section (l),-
(D in clause (i), for the words and comma "Law, Justice and
Parliamentary Affairs" the words "Human Rights" shall be
substituted;
(iD in clause (ii), for the words and commas'Secrctary, Ministry of
Law, Justice and Parliamentary Affairs" the words and comma
,"Secretary Ministry of Human Rights" shall be substituted; and
(b) in suLsection (7), for the words and commas "Secretary, Ministry of
Law, Justice and Parliamentary Affairs" the wotds and comma
"Secretary Ministry of Human Rights" shall be substituted.
ASIF ALI ZARDARI,
President.
